<title level="1" right="Action">[Body Constriction](/Actions.aspx?ID=1268) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 77

**Requirements** The constrictor has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

---

The skeletal constrictor deals 12 piercing damage to the grabbed creature with its sharp ribs; the creature must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. If the constrictor is a specialized companion, increase this damage to 20. This uses a trained DC using the constrictor's Constitution modifier, or an expert DC if the constrictor is specialized.
name: Body Constriction
requirement: The constrictor has a creature  grabbed .
